about_the_game:
Purchase the BATIM Bundle for 20% OFF and receive Chapter 5 COMPLETELY FREE!!


It's Time To Believe.
Experience the heart pounding second chapter of "Bendy and the Ink Machine"!

Continue the story as Henry trapped in the darkened halls of Joey Drew Studios.
With your path blocked, there's only one thing to do: Find a new way out.

In Chapter Two DLC, dive deeper into the animation studio and learn the secrets that it holds. Fight your way through and don't ever look back.
There is something in the darkness.
